item.title: On iTerm2 and solarized dark
item.description:
This weekend I’ve spent some time to understand Z Shell. I admit that I’ve should have done it ages ago. I actually regret not having done it ages ago, I would have saved a lot of time.

Moving your .bashrc to your new .zshrc is almost just copy and paste. And you suddently find yourself with a shell that makes you feel in the future!

If you additionally install oh my zsh, the only thing that your shell will be missing is the capability of making coffee. The official description is literally true:
